snippet.title: Highway Rally
snippet.description:
Hit the highway for a racing road-trip of pure adrenaline! Race on 20 extreme highway tracks, and beat target times and friends' high scores to unlock special cars, cash, and new levels. Let your need for speed drive you to win!

iOS: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/highway-rally/id572534263?ls=1&mt=8
google Play: http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.spilgames.highwayrally
Amazon: http://www.amazon.com/gp/mas/dl/android?p=com.spilgames.highwayrally

FEEL THE RUSH ON THE HIGHWAY
- Race on a total of 20 scenic highway tracks 
- Push your speed to beat gold, silver, or bronze target times
- Unlock new tracks if you get bronze or better
- 3+ hours of fast, high-velocity racing
- Earn in-game cash by completing tracks, getting air time, and drifting
- Collect special pick-ups and collectables

COOL CARS
- 11 vehicles
- Stunning Retina graphics!
- Upgrade your speed, acceleration, handlingand nitro tank with cash
- Upgrade your car's color, engine, spoiler, hood, and wheels
- Nitro tanks for turbo speed boosts

INTENSE GAMEPLAY
- Different camera views
- Compete against ghost cars and compare your performance to the target time
- Challenge your friends to beat your score on Game Center!
- Stay at maximum speed to beat the clock
- Swerve to avoid collisions with obstacles
- Get caught by the speed cameras and share the photo on Twitter and Facebook!

More updates full of exciting new features are coming soon, for FREE!
Stay tuned! 
Check our Official Website: [http://www.highwayrally.com/]

We like getting comments. Rate and review us!
